title: Tavernkeep
summaries: The Tavernkeep is a unique NPC vendor that accepts only Defender Medals as currency for most items, instead of coins. He will only become accessible after the player has defeated the Eater of Worlds or Brain of Cthulhu. Once this criteria is met, he will appear as the stationary Unconscious Man spawning in any layer of the world, and talking to him in this state wakes him up. If the Unconscious Man is killed, he will still be able to respawn afterwards; if the Tavernkeep NPC is killed, he will move in again after some time as long as there are vacant houses.

The <linked>Tavernkeep's sentry summon weapons</linked> are associated with the <linked>Old One's Army</linked> <linked>event</linked>, and at first can only be used within that event. They function elsewhere only after the event is completed once successfully. Each of the Tavernkeep's sentry summon weapons come in three tiers: rod, cane, and staff, with the staff being the most expensive and the most powerful. The armor he sells also associates each sentry type with a specific class: Ballista for <linked>melee</linked> (tank-style), Flameburst for <linked>magic</linked>, Explosive for <linked>rangers</linked>, and Lightning Aura for "speedy melee" (for <linked>summoners</linked>).

When the player selects the "Eternia Crystal" option for the first time, the Tavernkeep will give the player 10 Defender Medals for free. All future medals must be earned by defeating at least some waves of the Old One's Army.

When threatened, he throws mugs of <linked>Ale</linked> at enemies, dealing 24 / <linked>36</linked> / <linked>42</linked> damage at the start of the game. As players progress he will gain <linked>various stat increases</linked>. He may also drop an <linked>Ale Tosser</linked> upon death, allowing the player to perform the same attack.
The Unconscious Man is one of the few entities that can be detected by the <linked>Lifeform Analyzer</linked> or its upgrades.
